mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Acknowledges letter of 10th but declines to give an opinion as to female education as it is not a subject which has drawn his attention particularly; does not care to give hasty opinion which might be misused in public to revive hostile feelings in those who should have long ago forgotten them.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1821 September 25, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to A. and J. W. Picket, n.p.
